casebody.data:
HOME DEPOT U.S.A., INC., petitioner,
v.
Michael BAUER, et ux. No. 16-1205. Supreme Court of the United States May 15, 2017. Motion of The Product Liability Advisory Council, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States *2139Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
